description: This file defines the UserSettings entity class for a Java project using JPA/Hibernate. It maps to the 'user_settings' database table and includes fields such as id, user, timezone, locale, theme, and dailySummaryEmail, with respective getter and setter methods.

classes.name: UserSettings
classes.description: Entity class representing user settings, mapped to the 'user_settings' database table.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the user settings.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the user settings.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Associates a User entity with this settings record.

methods.name: isDailySummaryEmail
methods.description: Checks if daily summary emails are enabled.

methods.name: setDailySummaryEmail
methods.description: Enables or disables daily summary emails.
